data.rationale:
This module implements the Munkre's solution to classical
    Assignment problem. I dont think, CPAN currently has any module,
    solving this problem. So I would like to share my version of Mukre's
    solution with the CPAN community.

    For more information on Munkre's Solution visit:
    http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=362945&jmp=cit&dl=ACM&dl=ACM&CFID=://duluth.liblink.umn.edu/duluth?genre=article&CFTOKEN=duluth.liblink.umn.edu/duluth?genre=article#CIT
